parties.title: Amashyirahamwe y'amategeko
parties.subtitle: Mugire hamwe ku isi hose mu byerekeye imigambi yumvikanye

dialogs.about_to_dissolve: Uri gutangira gusesa {partyName}. Iki gikorwa ntacyo gisubizwa.
dialogs.leader_warning_found: Ubu uri umuyobozi wa {partyName}. Gukomeza ishyirahamwe gushya kuzongera ishyirahamwe wawe ubu.

pre_verification.description: Amatora y'igerageza azaza vuba. Emeza ubwoba bwawe ubu kugira ngo witegure igihe amatora azafungurwa.

coming_soon.description: Amatora yo kugerageza azatangira vuba. Wamaze kwemezwa kandi witeguye gutora ako kanya amatora atangiye.

app-purpose.question: Repubulika y'isi ni iki?
app-purpose.answer: Repubulika y'Isi ni pɛpɛ y'ubuyobozi y'ubwoba bufunguye ifite ifaranga rya dijitali ryayo ryawe rigamije gushyiraho gahunda ya demokarasi y'umutekano n'amahoro ku isi hose.

what-is-wdd.question: WDD ni iki?
what-is-wdd.answer: WDD (drachma y'isi) ni ifaranga ryemewe rya blockchain-native rya Repubulika y'Isi, ryasohowe nk'amashini ya ERC-20 y'ibanze mu mirongo myinshi.

drachma-value.question: Drachma ibona agaciro ki?
drachma-value.answer: Drachma ikura amafaranga yayo kubera ko ari ifaranga ryemewe rya Repubulika y'Isi. Nk'uko uburenganzira bw'urubuga rwacu rw'ubuyobozi bw'isi rukagira, WDD irashobora kuba ikinyabiziga cyo gusubiramo mu isi yose no gucunga ibintu by'ibanze mu bukungu bw'isi.

identity-verification.question: Uko kwemeza aho wavuka gukora gute?
identity-verification.answer: Repubulika y'Isi ikoresha Self kugira ngo yemeze ubwoba bwawe ukoresheje pasiporo cyangwa indangamuntu y'igihugu. Ubwigenge bwawe bukabuzwa—Self gusa ikemeza ko uri umuntu w'ukuri nta makuru y'ubwoba wayerekana.

test-elections.question: Ni iki amatora y'igerageza?
test-elections.answer: Amatora y'igerageza ni ubushakashatsi aho abaturage ba Repubulika y'Isi batora amashyaka ya politiki. Buri shyaka rishyirwa ku rupapuro rw'itora mu buryo bwikora, bigaha amahirwe angana abayobozi bose babyifuza.

party-subsidies.question: Inkunga z'amashyaka zikora gute?
party-subsidies.answer: Repubulika y'Isi itera inkunga amashyaka ya politiki hashingiwe ku nkunga ya demokarasi. Dutanga inkunga za WDD zikwiriye hagendewe ku byavuye mu matora, tukizeza ko buri jwi ryongera umutungo w'ishyaka.

verification-required.question: Ese birakenewe kwemeza umwirondoro kugira ngo witabire?
verification-required.answer: Kwemeza umwirondoro bisabwa gusa mu gutora. Ushobora gushinga amashyaka no koherereza WDD wavanye mu nkunga z'amashyaka utabanje kwemeza umwirondoro.

send.title: Ohereza WDD
send.choice_description: Hitamo uko ushaka kohereza drachma yawe.

withdraw_to_crypto.title: Kuramo
withdraw_to_crypto.description: Kuramo WDD kuri konte ya crypto

delete_account.description: Ibi bizasiba konti yawe byuzuye kandi bizakuramo amakuru yawe yose ku maseriveri yacu. Iki gikorwa ntikishobora guhindurwa — komeza ufatanya.

receive.title: Kwemera WDD
receive.description: Ganira izina ryawe ry'ukoresha kugira ngo wakire WDD kuvuye kuri inshuti zawe.

username.label: Izina ry'ukoresha
username.description: Inyuguti 3-30, alfanumerike, imirongo yo munsi na hyphen

self.dialog_description: Scan uyu kode ya QR kugira ngo wemezwe ukoresheje Self.
self.mobile_dialog_description: Uzasubizwa kuri porogaramu ya Self kugira ngo urangize kwemezwa.

verification_explainer.title: Kwemeza byakenewe
verification_explainer.description: Nyamuneka wuzuze kwemeza kugira ngo ukure tokens.

re_verification_explainer.title: Kwongera kwemeza byakenewe
re_verification_explainer.description: Kubera umutekano wawe, dukeneye kwemeza gushya mbere y'ibikorwa byangiza nk'ukure. Ibi bifasha kurinda konti yawe kuri kwinjira bitemewe.

wdd_import_info.message_prefix: Porfolio nyinshi zerekana WDD gusa nyuma y'uko byinjizwa n'abantu ku rutonde rwatoranyijwe ku

auth.sign_in_or_create: Injira konti yawe ukoresheje passkey, ukoresheje urutoki, gusuzuma ubwoba cyangwa gukinga ecran.
auth.passkey_name_description: Tanga izina rya passkey yawe kugirango uyimenye mu muyobozi w'ibanga.
